subject: Pedal plate update
description_text:
Hi,
In May of 2024, I placed an order through Amazon for your pedals. Shortly after receiving them, I saw that the pedal plats had been updated to be more curved, than the straight up and down ones I received. I have tried to get use to them, and as great as the Pro Plus pedals are, the straight up and down pedals are difficult on your feet.

I have tried just finding the curved pedal faceplates to order on Amazon and your site but have failed to be able to find them.

If you could link me to where I can order some, I would appreciate it. I know they came out shortly after I received mine, and the price was no different, so any help would be greatly appreciated.

Here are the order details for when I ordered my pedals, so you can verify purchase:
